nodes.text: The X4-Z2 Battle Droid was a model of three-legged battle droid used by the Exchange on the moon Nar Shaddaa during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. The Exchange used a number of X4-Z2 droids to patrol the Coronet Boulevard of the Corellian Sector.
The X4-Z2 Battle Droid appears on Nar Shaddaa in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game released by BioWare in 2011.
